cab.content: ^CUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S government cp(77) 9925 October 1977CABINETTHE QUEEN'S SPEECH ON THE PROROGATION OF PARLIAMENTNotfc by the Secretary of the CabinetI circulated under cover of CP(77) 95 for the information of the Cabinet acopy of The Queen's Speech on the Prorogation of Parliament in the formin which it had been submitted to the Counsellors of State. The Speechhas subsequently been revised to take account of The Queen's wish to havethe opening paragraph transferred from the Prorogation Speech to theOpening Speech and has accordingly been resubmitted to the Counsellorsof State.Signed JOHN HUNTCOPY NOCabinet Office25 October 1977
